improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero in line 10: z = x/y. Add a check to ensure y is not zero before the division. For example: if (y != 0) { z = x / y; } else { handle the error appropriately, e.g., set z to a default value or throw an exception }.
The variable x is always even after the first iteration of the loop. So it's always the else condition in the if block at line 7.  This means the y always equals 4 after the first iteration.
Unreachable code path: The if condition inside the loop (line 6) is always false because x is always even after the first iteration, meaning that y will always be 4.
